text:
Victoria Beckham ditches the crutches as she heads to New York for birthday breakfast with son Brooklyn

The fashion designer is on the mend after injuring her foot in a skiing accident

View 14 Images Victoria Beckham ditches the crutches as she visits Brooklyn in New York (Image: Copyright unknown)

Victoria Beckham is off the crutches and back in heels!

‌



The Spice Girl turned fashion designer has been hobbling around on a pair of crutches lately following a skiing accident, but her style game has officially resumed.

‌



Just days after branding herself a "terrible mother" for sending her three youngest kids off to school in the snow, VB has jetted to New York for her eldest's birthday.

‌



Brooklyn turns 19 tomorrow and kick-started the celebrations by having breakfast with mum.

View 14 Images Victoria has got rid of her crutches (Image: Splash News)

View 14 Images She injured herself skiing (Image: Splash News)

‌



View 14 Images Brooklyn turns 19 tomorrow (Image: Splash News)

Victoria, 43, wrapped up warm in a turtleneck and red knit top that she paired with a red plaid skirt and a pair of heeled boots.

She wore her hair in a bun and kept her eyes hidden beneath a pair of designer shades as she stepped out with Brooklyn, who was wearing black trousers and a bomber jacket, decorated with patches, that was a gift from his girlfriend, actress Chloe Moretz.

‌



Brooklyn moved to New York last year to study photography, but has remained very close to his family, particularly his mum who visits on a regular basis.

The teenager flashed photographers a smile as he walked round to the other side of a waiting car, while his mum climbed into the back.

Brooklyn recently showed the world how much he loves his mum by getting a tattoo to honour her.

‌



View 14 Images She's on the mend (Image: Instagram/victoriabeckham)

View 14 Images Brooklyn's new tattoo (Image: brooklynbeckham/Instagram)

Victoria Beckham ,forces kids to school, in snow with worst snacks

‌



Taking to Instagram, the 18-year-old who got his first tatt back in April and has since had more than eight designs inked on his body, shared a black and white snap of the word 'mum' written across a heart and three roses.

Famous Los Angeles-based tattoo artist Dr Woo, who has worked on Brooklyn before, was the one responsible for the aspiring photographer's latest design.

And just last month, Brooklyn celebrated girlfriend Chloe's 21st birthday, meaning she could have something special planned for him.

‌



Brooklyn has been discovering his style since he moved to New York.

And he debuted a very different look as he rocked guyliner to one of Chloe's birthday celebrations.

14 View 14 Images Brooklyn was wearing a jacket that girlfriend Chloe bought him (Image: Splash News) 14 View 14 Images She's back in heels (Image: Splash News)

‌



View 14 Images Brooklyn flashes snappers a smile (Image: Splash News)

Brooklyn showed off his new look as he posed up with his other half for a birthday snap at her party at restaurant Beauty & Essex in Los Angeles.

And Brooklyn took to Instagram to share snaps from their date night.

‌



In one, Brooklyn sits on a crushed velvet and leather sofa and Chloe sprawls out across him.

His short brown hair is spiked up with gel and he has a tiny moustache and goatee beard.

He also has a line shaved into his right eyebrow.

‌



The photography student is wearing a white T-shirt and black jeans with black chunky boots, and finished his look off with a flick of eyeliner.

View 14 Images Her style game is back on (Image: Splash News)

View 14 Images Brooklyn recently celebrated Chloe's 21st (Image: Splash News)

‌



David Beckham plays with his kids in the London snow

He has his legs crossed and Chloe props herself up against him as she lies back on the sofa with her legs propped up on the arm.

The red-lipped actress shows off her toned pins in a black velvet mini dress and knee-high leather boots.

‌



In another picture, they've changed outfits, but Brooklyn still looks to be wearing his guyliner.

In this snap, he's wearing a white shirt and braces, while blonde beauty Chloe wears an Oriental-style dress.

She's holding a plate in one hand and shoving cake into her boyfriend's mouth with the other.

‌



View 14 Images They're so loved up (Image: WENN.com)

View 14 Images Brooklyn was wearing guyliner at her birthday party (Image: Instagram)

View 14 Images He's changed his look since moving to New York (Image: Instagram)

‌



"Special night," he said as he posted the pictures on Instagram.

Fans were torn over his look.

One said: "Couple of the year"

Article continues below

"perfect," said another.

And another wrote: "Serious couple goals"

But another commented: "Wee man, see the line you aren’t meant to cross re make up, hair dye and shaved eyebrow. Look behind you. You’ve crossed it."
